Package data

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single word parsed from input file.

    • Field Detail

      • VOWELS

        public static final char[] VOWELS
        Array containing all the setOfVowels to be found. It was assumed the letter 'Y' is not a pure vowel.

      • countVowels

        private int countVowels​(java.lang.String word)
        Counts all setOfVowels appearing in the word and builds a set of distinct setOfVowels.
        Parameters:
        word - data.Word to have setOfVowels counted.
        Returns:
        Returns number of setOfVowels present in a word.
